title: Bee Movie
summary: Bee Movie is a 2007 American computer-animated comedy film directed by Simon J. Smith and Steve Hickner, and written by Jerry Seinfeld, Andy Robin, Barry Marder, and Spike Feresten. It stars the voices of Seinfeld, Ren√©e Zellweger, Matthew Broderick, John Goodman, Patrick Warburton, and Chris Rock. The film centers on a honey bee Barry B. Benson (Seinfeld) trying to sue the human race for exploiting bees, after learning from his florist friend Vanessa Bloome (Zellweger) that humans sell and consume honey.
